creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
text:
In the examples webapp, edit the web.xml to add:
<user-data-constraint>
  <transport-guarantee>CONFIDENTIAL</transport-guarantee>
</user-data-constraint>

Now attempting to access http://localhost:8080/examples/jsp/security/index.jsp 
will be allowed (after authenticating of course) even though the use of the 
http protocol has been explicitly disallowed.

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
Fixed in 3.3, please check latest from CVS. Nothing fancy - we just check and 
report an error, redirects or other advanced behavior in a future version.
